comment._content: poor U-7, accidentally sunk by another u-boat (U-22) uboat.net/wwi/boats/index.html?boat=7

comment.author: 83025347@N00
comment._content: U-12, on the left, didn't do much better. Rammed, shelled and scuttled. 20 dead, 10 survivors. The wreck was recently found.
